localizedText.Drop_Source_TextContent: Drop a source from the target browser
localizedText.Status_Obsolete_Tooltip: The Analytics Storage Provider is obsolete. Please update!
localizedText.Error_Layout_Guid_Invalid: LayoutID is not valid. It has to be a guid 'XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXX'. Please check and try again.
localizedText.Error_Layout_Guid_Empty: LayoutID is an empty guid. Please insert the correct guid and try again.
localizedText.Error_StreamSystemID_Invalid: StreamSystemID is not valid. It has to be a guid 'XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXX'. Please check and try again.
localizedText.Error_StreamSystemID_Empty: StreamSystemID is an empty guid. Please insert the correct guid and try again.
localizedText.Remove_Cert_Request: Do your really want to remove the certificate file?
localizedText.Add_Cert: The source you dropped contains a Certificate-files. Please choose and upload the files to the server-extension.
localizedText.Remove_Source: Do your really want to delete this datasource?! The configuration will be deleted permanently.
